mapper.insert: insert into FeeItem(ItemCode, ItemName, ItemUnit, FeeTypeNo, FeePayMethod, FeeCycle, ItemStatus, ItemDesc) values(#{itemcode}, #{itemname}, #{itemunit}, #{feetype.typeno}, #{feepaymethod}, #{feecycle}, #{itemstatus}, #{itemdesc})
mapper.select: select fi.ItemNo, fi.ItemCode, fi.ItemName, fi.ItemUnit, fi.FeeTypeNo, fi.FeePayMethod, fi.FeeCycle, fi.ItemStatus, fi.ItemDesc from FeeItem fi where fi.ItemNo = #{no}

select fi.ItemNo, fi.ItemCode, fi.ItemName, fi.ItemUnit, fi.FeeTypeNo, fi.FeePayMethod, fi.FeeCycle, fi.ItemStatus, fi.ItemDesc, ft.TYPENAME from FeeItem fi, FeeType ft where fi.ItemNo = #{no} and fi.FeeTypeNo = ft.TYPENO
select fi.ItemNo, fi.ItemCode, fi.ItemName, fi.ItemUnit, fi.FeeTypeNo, fi.FeePayMethod, fi.FeeCycle, fi.ItemStatus, fi.ItemDesc from FeeItem fi

select fi.ItemNo, fi.ItemCode, fi.ItemName, fi.ItemUnit, fi.FeeTypeNo, fi.FeePayMethod, fi.FeeCycle, fi.ItemStatus, fi.ItemDesc from FeeItem fi
and fi.ItemNo >= (select ItemNo from FeeItem ORDER BY ItemNo LIMIT #{start}, 1) LIMIT #{rows}
